content.query:
use FnO
go

create view raw.vw_dLegalEntity as 
  select l.RecId as [Key]
        ,upper(dpt.DataArea) as DataAreaId
        ,dpt.Name as CompanyName   
    from raw.Ledger l
         inner join raw.DirPartyTable dpt on l.PrimaryForLegalEntity = dpt.RecId
go

/*
-- Need to delete the storage in data lake
drop external table dw.dLegalEntity
go
*/

create external table dw.dLegalEntity with (
    location = 'DataWarehouse/dLegalEntity'
   ,data_source = ParquetDataSource
   ,file_format = ParquetFileFormat
) as 
    select * from raw.vw_dLegalEntity
go

-- select * from raw.vw_dLegalEntity
-- select * from dw.dLegalEntity
